Hi All there is any HubSpot API client which can support php 7.0

[InvalidArgumentException]

Hi there - is there a way to delete a specific value from a multicheckbox property?
You need to send it as a POST request

Hi, when using *line_items/batch/create* is there a way to apply sort ordering? ...i.e. the line_items are being created but in a randomized order when viewed on the Deal screen. I'm not seeing a way for my users to sort them on the Deal screen so I'd like to make sure they're created in an specified order.

Hi! Wasn't quite sure where to put this but i'm trying to implement a webhook handler in c# (dotnet 6). Has anyone managed to validate the V3 signature? I just can't get my hash to match the one provided by HubSpot. Are there any code samples out there that I can check mine against?
Cheers!
where can I request?
You can put the request in the idea's channel or in the community <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1668632192671529>

Hey everyone! Just curious, is there an file extraction end-point (either undocumented or in beta or on the roadmap) for the Files API? I know there's one for the Source Code API, so I figured I would ask if the Files API has one or is going to have one.

Hi All, it's nice to meet you all here, does any one know how can we limit the API call on HubSpot? We are running a sync with Zoho but it seems like the API call is continue happening after the sync.
Do you mean the sync is happening from a webhook? do you think you can provide a little more info?

Hey team, can anyone point me in the right direction for getting a list of form submissions for a specific contact via a private app API connection?

Previously we were using this endpoint but this does not support private apps
```<http://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/email/{{> email }}/profile```
The new v3 endpoint I am testing does not include this same information
FYI ... setting the "hs_position_on_quote" property solved this for me.
